kv6.7:5.3: Rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ rūpadhātu nīlaṃ pītakaṃ lohitakaṃ odātaṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ cakkhusmiṃ paṭihaññati cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti?
kv6.7:7.9: Hañci “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇan”ti—
kv6.7:7.10: attheva suttanto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv6.7:8.4: Nanu passati dvinnaṃ rukkhānaṃ antaraṃ, dvinnaṃ thambhānaṃ antaraṃ, tāḷacchiddaṃ vātapānacchiddanti?
kv6.7:8.6: Hañci passati dvinnaṃ rukkhānaṃ antaraṃ, dvinnaṃ thambhānaṃ antaraṃ, tāḷacchiddaṃ vātapānacchiddaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
